title: (Happy Path) : Case Access Administrator successfully Requests NoC for a non-represented litigant - No auto-approval applies
specs: Richard - with the ability to create a case for a particular jurisdiction within an organisation
Matt - with a pui-caa role for a different organisation to that of Richard
Alice - with a pui-caa role and a solicitor role for a jurisdiction that does not match Case C1 below
is made by Alice to place a NOC Request for C1
contains all correct answers in the correct format
contains answers identifying case role R2
